text: The National Assembly is Zambia's unicameral legislative body. Between 1972 and 1990, Zambia was a one-party state with the United National Independence Party (UNIP) as the sole legal party. The Speaker, first deputy speaker and the Vice President are also given a seat in the assembly. ==References== Category:Politics of Zambia Category:Unicameral legislatures
title: National Assembly of Zambia
